name: Drop The Box!
description:
Deliver the box above the height to the friendly worker below. Watch the box swings, then tap to drop it at the right time and direction. Mind the obstacles, or use them to help you make the box fall right on the designated forklift. Advance to the next level to see more fun challenges. Tap precisely, unless you want to make the friendly worker feel sad.

How many level can you pass? Let us know via info@alegrium.com
